```{r}
x_colors <- c(red="red",
   blue="blue",
   yellow="yellow",
   orange="#FFAA0066");
hslM <- col2hsl(x_colors);
hslM;
#>       red blue yellow orange
#> H       0  240     60   40.0
#> S     100  100    100  100.0
#> L      50   50     50   50.0
#> alpha   1    1      1    0.4

# Now convert back to R hex colors
colorV <- hsl2col(hslM);
colorV;
#>         red        blue      yellow      orange 
#>   "#FF0000"   "#0000FF"   "#FFFF00" "#FFAA0066" 

for h in (10:360:12)

```
